EmailTemplate.name: FalconConnect
EmailTemplate.subject: FalconConnect Invoice -
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Please find attached the monthly invoice and call log for your terminal(s). The attached excel version of your invoice contains 3 tabs with specific details of your monthly usage.
If you have questions about your invoice, please e-mail FalconConnect@honeywell.com or call +1 602 365 6425
Thank you for using our services!
